author: rooneg
msg: Keep people from shooting themselves in the foot by installing this port
alongside of the apache2 port.
* packages/freebsd/apr-snapshot/pkg-install
new script to check for apache2 and error out if it is there.
* packages/freebsd/apr-snapshot/Makefile
run the pkg-install script in the pre-fetch target.

author: rooneg
msg: Ladies and gentlemen, the FreeBSD port of Subversion 0.10.
* packages/freebsd/subversion/distinfo
update md5's.
* packages/freebsd/subversion/files/patch-build.conf
track changes to build.conf.
* packages/freebsd/subversion/Makefile
update version numbers and location of tarballs.  update some comments.
add a hack to find the neon libs, since the freebsd neon port doesn't seem
to be installing libneon.la.  while i'm here, silence some warnings from
portlint, mostly related to whitespace.
* packages/freebsd/apr-snapshot/distinfo
update md5's.
* packages/freebsd/apr-snapshot/Makefile
update version numbers.

author: gstein
msg: Links to directories should have a trailing slash. Without it, the
server will typically issue a redirect to the browser to put it on
there (this is definitely the behavior of mod_dav_svn). Thus, omitting
the trailing slash is an easy way to generate unneeded traffic.

author: sussman
msg: * project_source.html:  mention the ability to browse with ordinary browser.

author: kfogel
msg: * www/project_status.html: Move M10 to the "met" section.
